src_original: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /
yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
duḥkhena cāhamanarthī /  iyañcākṣāntirāyatyāṃ puranapi me duḥkhahetusthānīyā /  so 'hametadduḥkhahetubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ samādāya varteyam /

tgt_original: 便非愛己。 成自苦縛。

src_original: na tathā pareṣām /  svabhāvataśca duḥkhaprakṛtikā eveme sarvasaṃskārāḥ svaparasāntānikāḥ /
tgt_original: 二性皆行苦思。 又自他身性皆行苦。
